original_body_lines: A religious ceremony was held at the Gouthama Viharaya, Narahenpita to mark the 74th birthday of former President Gotabaya Rajapaksa under the patronage of Venerable Dr. Itthepane Dhammalankara Thero. Anunayake Reverend Vedaruve Upali Thero of the Asgiri Chapter conducted religious observances with the participation of members of the Maha Sanga and others. Pix by Pradeep Pathirana
